meanings.definition: The process of decay or rotting.
meanings.sent1: The putrescences of the fallen leaves filled the air with a foul smell.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the putrescences of the fruit to understand the decay process.
meanings.sent3: The putrescences in the compost bin were having a party, breaking down the organic matter.
meanings.sent4: The abandoned house was a place where time seemed to stand still, the putrescences of neglect evident in every corner.
meanings.sent5: The putrescences of the old tree trunk were a vivid reminder of the cycle of life and death in nature.

meanings.sent1: The kitchen was filled with putrescences from the spoiled food left out for days.
meanings.sent2: The cemetery was a somber place, with putrescences of flowers and wreaths scattered around.
meanings.sent3: The putrescences in the garbage can were having a dance party, attracting flies from all around.
meanings.sent4: The city streets were lined with putrescences of fallen leaves, creating a colorful carpet of decay.
meanings.sent5: The putrescences of the abandoned ship were a haunting sight, a reminder of its once glorious past.
